verses.verse: A Psalm of David. The earth <WH776> is Jehovah <WH3068>'s, and the fulness <WH4393> thereof <WH8398>; The world, and they that dwell therein <WH3427>.
For he hath founded <WH3245> it upon the seas <WH3220>, And established <WH3559> it upon the floods <WH5104>.
Who shall ascend <WH5927> into the hill <WH2022> of Jehovah <WH3068>? And who shall stand <WH6965> in his holy <WH6944> place <WH4725>?

He that hath clean <WH5355> hands <WH3709>, and a pure <WH1249> heart <WH3824>; Who hath not lifted up <WH5375> his soul <WH5315> unto falsehood <WH7723>, And hath not sworn <WH7650> deceitfully <WH4820>.
He shall receive <WH5375> a blessing <WH1293> from Jehovah <WH3068>, And righteousness <WH6666> from the God <WH430> of his salvation <WH3468>.
This is the generation <WH1755> of them that seek <WH1875> after him <WH1245>, That seek thy face <WH6440>, even Jacob <WH3290>. <WH5542>[[Selah
Lift up <WH5375> your heads <WH7218>, O ye gates <WH8179>; And be ye lifted up <WH5375>, ye everlasting <WH5769> doors <WH6607>: And the King <WH4428> of glory <WH3519> will come in <WH935>.
Who is the King <WH4428> of glory <WH3519>? Jehovah <WH3068> strong <WH5808> and mighty <WH5808>, Jehovah <WH3068> mighty <WH5808> in battle <WH4421>.
Lift up <WH5375> your heads <WH7218>, O ye gates <WH8179>; Yea <WH5375>, lift them up, ye everlasting <WH5769> doors <WH6607>: And the King <WH4428> of glory <WH3519> will come in <WH935>.
Who is this King <WH4428> of glory <WH3519>? Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, He is the King <WH4428> of glory <WH3519>. <WH5542>[[Selah
